thread.title: Regulations needed to reduce excessive helicopter noise in L.A. County, activists say
thread.title_full: Regulations needed to reduce excessive helicopter noise in L.A. County, activists say - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Regulations needed to reduce excessive helicopter noise in L.A. County, activists say
text: Frustrated by years of largely unsuccessful efforts to get helicopter companies and pilots to voluntarily adopt noise-reduction policies, activists are now asking the FAA to enact mandatory regulations in their quest for quieter skies over
